review_data.title: Avoid at all costs
review_data.content: The pizza is ok but everything else is a disaster. My mum ordered a chicken schnitzel but there's no way it was chicken, I had curry which was was tasteless. The staff didn't seem to want anything to do with us.

review_data.title: Agréable surprise
review_data.content: Idéal pour ceux qui arrivent tard au "the guests' house". C'est la surprise quand on rentre dans ce restaurant. La...More
